participant_1.background:
I was a personal chef before I started my own meatloaf catering business.
i like to stay fit.
I have a dog and a cat, both of whom are very well-behaved.
I like my job, but I don't have a lot of family support.
I am short for my age, but I am strong and fit.

participant_2.background:
I love to play with my baby's mobile.
I am a clumsy person who likes to read pet training blogs and websites.
i have aspergers.
I play the flute to bring peace and tranquility to my surroundings.
I will do laundry and spend time with my family.

content.text: Good! I am a little clumsy but I am doing okay. How are you?
I am doing great! I am a personal chef but I recently started my own meatloaf catering business. How do you like your job?
I am a stay at home mom and I love it! I do have aspbergers and I love to read pet training blogs and websites.
That is great! Do you have any pets?
I have a dog and a cat. They are both very well-behaved.
That is awesome! I am short for my age but I am strong and fit. I like to stay fit and I enjoy playing sports.
I love to play with my baby's mobile! I play the flute to bring peace and tranquility to my surroundings.
That is a great way to relax! I spend time with my family and do laundry.
I love to do laundry! I also like to spend time with my family.
It sounds like we have a lot in common!
Yes! It is nice to meet you!
It is nice to meet you too
